title: Stynger
summaries: The Stynger is a Hardmode, post-Golem launcher which has a 14.29*1/7 (14.29%) / 12.5*1/8 (12.5%) chance to be dropped by Golem. It auto-fires Stynger Bolts, which are initially dropped by Golem along with the weapon, and can also later be purchased from the Witch Doctor or Arms Dealer when the Stynger is in the player's inventory.

The Stynger Bolts explode on impact, dealing damage to anything in the explosion radius. Arching shrapnel is thrown from the explosion, each causing additional smaller explosions that inflict the same base damage.
The initial bolt does double damage on direct hits to a single target. This does not apply to the fragments.

statistics.Damage: 45 / 43 (Ranged)
statistics.Tooltip:
Shoots an explosive bolt
Does extra damage on a direct hit
statistics.Sell: 7
